original_text: And he struck down a huge Egyptian. Although the Egyptian had a spear in his hand, Benaiah went against him with a club. He snatched the spear from the Egyptian’s hand and killed him with his own spear.
korean_text: 또 장대한 애굽 사람을 죽였는데 그의 손에 창이 있어도 그가 막대기를 가지고 내려가 그 애굽 사람의 손에서 창을 빼앗아 그 창으로 그를 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: And he struck down a huge Egyptian.
Although the Egyptian had a spear in his hand,
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 사람이 손에 창을 들고 있었지만,

sentences.original_text: Benaiah went against him with a club.
He snatched the spear from the Egyptian's hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이집트 사람의 손에서 창을 빼앗았고

sentences.original_text: and killed him with his own spear.
